Genetic data. BIN : BOLD :AAD8229 (n=7 from Ethiopia , n=7 from Somalia , Kenya , Tanzania and Malawi ; maximum variation 0.8%). Nearest species:
Z. ilma
(4.8%).
Distribution. Ethiopia , Kenya , Nigeria , Sudan , Tanzania ( Fletcher 1974 ; Garlacz 2001 ). New for Malawi and Somalia .
